DrifterMod:DexDownPower.NAME: Dex Down
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #b Dexterity at the end of the turn.

DrifterMod:DriftingPower.NAME: Drifting...
DESCRIPTIONS: Maintains your drift. If you don't have this, lose all your Drift at the end of the turn.

DrifterMod:DriftPower.NAME: Drift
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b block and deal #b damage to all enemies at the end of the turn.

DrifterMod:TempRetainPower.NAME: Retain
DESCRIPTIONS: Keep #b cards in your hand this turn only.

DrifterMod:ThornsDownPower.NAME: Thorns Down
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #b Thorns at the start of your turn.

DrifterMod:DriftStrengthDownPower.NAME: Drifting Strength
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #b Strength if you lose your Drift.

DrifterMod:TempMaxHandSizeInc.NAME: Temp Max Hand Size
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase your Max Hand size by #b until next turn.

DrifterMod:OverdrawNextTurn.NAME: Overdraw
DESCRIPTIONS: Next turn, draw 2. If your hand is full, draw when it empties.
